text:
Dec 23, 24
• Explored Metabase interface and navigated through existing dashboards
• Reviewed table documentation to understand core entities and relationships
• Reviewed SQL behind existing cards to understand joins and aggregations

Dec 26
• Practiced creating cards using joins, filters, and summarize metrics
• Analyzed existing dashboards to understand metric selection and layout
Dec 29
• Built a practice dashboard using the Metabase sample database.
• Gained clarity on selecting appropriate metrics, summarize options, and visualizations for KPI cards
• Submitted the practice dashboard for review and awaiting further tasks

Dec 30
Started working on the newly assigned dashboard .
Explored the database , identified relevant tables, and implemented a few initial KPI cards.
Attended the weekly review call
